name: Lam
wishText: I hope we're going to be buddies till death do us part, brethren
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday! Chuc mung sinh nhat, hanh phuc, vui ve
